main event: A UFO was reported to have been observed at Fort Knox, Kentucky, on November 6, 1957, with military personnel witnessing a bright, rapidly moving light in the sky.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 15-20 minutes,The object was tracked by radar,Multiple military personnel reported seeing the object,The object changed direction and accelerated rapidly before disappearing,The object was described as a blue-yellow oval shape hovering at about 30 feet before it moved rapidly northeast.
witness description: a military police officer on duty
